### Air Cadet Power Pilot Training Course

#### Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the Power Pilot Training Course (PPTC) to the Royal Canadian Air Cadets (RC Air Cadets). This project involves delivering ground school instruction and flight training to Transport Canada standards within a seven-week intensive period during the summer.

#### Project Overview

The PPTC is a youth program funded by Canada, which provides up to 175 selected Air Cadets with the opportunity to earn a Transport Canada Private Pilot Licence – Aeroplane. This training consists of ground school instruction and flight training, in accordance with the Canadian Aviation Regulations (CARs).

#### Contract Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering the PPTC to the RC Air Cadets, which includes:

*   Ground school instruction
*   Flight training to Transport Canada standards
*   Compliance with the Canadian Aviation Regulations (CARs)

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the lowest price. The selected contractor will be required to demonstrate their ability to meet the project requirements and deliver the training within the specified timeframe.
